page.title: 02Schools in Stone & Oulton
page.content: There are three first schools, one primary school, one middle school, one high school,and one independant school.You have to be aged 4-9 to go to Manor Hill First School (Headmaster G.D Mackenzie) or Christ Church C.E.(C) First School (Headmaster J.Oakes). Oulton C.E.(A) First School (Headmaster B.H.P.Warren) takes children aged 3-9.Then you have to be aged 9-13 for Christ Church C.E.(A) Middle School (Headmaster J.Brewer). For Alleyne's High School (see page 3) you have to be 13 and leave at 16 or 18. Manor Hill First is in Manor Rise, Walton.Christ Church First is in Northesk St.Oulton First is in Rock Cres., Oulton.Christ Church Middle is in Old Rd.St.Dominic's R.C.(A) Primary School in Newcastle Rd. takes children from 4-11.St.Dominic's Priory R.C. Independent School has 3-18 yr. olds.
